categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Prolifera system was located in the Corosi sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories.
The Prolifera system was home to the sentient Proliferan species and shared its name with the Proliferan Empire of that species.
The Prolifera system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square N-6.
